name: Mine Royale - Battle Royale
description: Mine Royale - Battle Royale is the fun new blocky battle royale game. It's a fun single-player and online game! Alot of new updates are coming soon!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, Windows 8 Classic or Windows 10 Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5850 or 500MB VRam card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
